brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts three aspects of convergence in network design.

Legacy Equipment - This diagram depicts photographs of legacy equipment, including small PBX systems, large telephone switches, and wiring closet infrastructure.

Advanced Technology - This diagram depicts photographs of advanced technology equipment, including medium to large business switches and an IP phone, and small to medium business switches and an IP phone.

New Options - This diagram depicts photographs of equipment with new options, including video conferencing, PC-based IP phone applications, and advanced IP phones.
